channel.title: CVE Feed for GloriaFood -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GloriaFood -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-32516|2024-09-24T19:27:02.805Z -- gloriafood -- restaurant%20menu%20%E2%80%93%20food%20ordering%20system%20%E2%80%93%20table%20reservation
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in GloriaFood Restaurant Menu – Food Ordering System – Table Reservation plugin <= 2.3.6 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-32579|2024-08-08T16:11:23.253Z -- gloriafood -- restaurant%20menu%20%E2%80%93%20food%20ordering%20system%20%E2%80%93%20table%20reservation
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GloriaFood Restaurant Menu – Food Ordering System – Table Reservation allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Restaurant Menu – Food Ordering System – Table Reservation: from n/a through 2.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-32579|2024-08-02T02:13:40.064Z -- gloriafood -- restaurant%20menu%20%E2%80%93%20food%20ordering%20system%20%E2%80%93%20table%20reservation
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GloriaFood Restaurant Menu – Food Ordering System – Table Reservation allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Restaurant Menu – Food Ordering System – Table Reservation: from n/a through 2.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-1399|2024-06-17T14:21:40.836Z -- gloriafood -- restaurant%20menu%20%E2%80%93%20food%20ordering%20system%20%E2%80%93%20table%20reservation
item.description: The Restaurant Menu – Food Ordering System – Table Reservation plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's shortcode(s) in all versions up to, and including, 2.4.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-32579|2024-04-18T09:27:19.303Z -- gloriafood -- restaurant%20menu%20%E2%80%93%20food%20ordering%20system%20%E2%80%93%20table%20reservation
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GloriaFood Restaurant Menu – Food Ordering System – Table Reservation allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Restaurant Menu – Food Ordering System – Table Reservation: from n/a through 2.4.1.

This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.description: The Restaurant Menu – Food Ordering System – Table Reservation plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's shortcode(s) in all versions up to, and including, 2.4.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
